home.headline: Register for the AfSNET programme
home.intro: This portal supports participant registration and shares event information, travel guidance, hotels, and media resources. Replace placeholders with confirmed details.

about.headline: Register for the AfSNET programme
about.intro: AfSNET (Africa Sub-Sovereign Network) is a structured platform that convenes sub-national governments (states, provinces, regions, counties, and cities) with investors, businesses, development partners, and technical experts to develop and accelerate bankable projects and partnerships. The programme exists to bridge the gap between sub-national development priorities and investable opportunities by strengthening project preparation, improving investor readiness, and enabling coordinated implementation. It supports the translation of local priorities in areas such as infrastructure, industrialization, agribusiness value chains, trade facilitation, and SME development into credible pipelines that can attract financing and deliver measurable development outcomes.

hotels.intro: Replace placeholders with negotiated hotels, booking codes, and cut-off dates.
bookingGuidance: Use the official rate code where provided.
Confirm the booking cut-off date before making payment.
Keep a copy of your booking confirmation.
transportNotes: Airport transfer options will be shared closer to the event.
Allow buffer time during peak traffic hours.
